full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS MA GDUGS GTZUG GTOR DKAR MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR MI MTHUN GA-YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE MTSON CHA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS MA GTZUG TOR DKAR MO BZLOG BSGYUR MTHUN YUL LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLA MA DKON MCHOG GSUM LA DBYER MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN PA DGE SLONG NOM CHE NANG SO NGAG DBANG SBYIN PA'I BSKUL BA'I DO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU NGUR SMRIG 'DZIN PA'I ZLOS GAR BSGYUR BA RJE BTZUN RDO RJE 'CHANG, DZA YA PAndI TA ZHES MTSAN YONGS GRAGS PA 'DI NYID KYI ZHABS KYI RDUL SKYES BOS LEN PA BKA' DRIN GYIS CUNG ZAD MNOS PA BYANG PHYOGS SOGS PA YUL 'DIR 'KHYAMS PA'I PHYOGS MED BLO ZHI MING CAN GYIS SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I GSUM RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD THUN GA-YUL LAS RNAMS PAR RGYAL BAR GYUR CIG , ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
